tickets.subject: Cannot login to account
tickets.description: I have been unable to login to my account since yesterday morning. Password reset does not work either.

tickets.subject: Double charged for subscription
tickets.description: My credit card was charged twice for the monthly subscription renewal on January 15th.

tickets.subject: App crashes on startup
tickets.description: The application crashes immediately after opening on my Android phone with a white screen error.

tickets.subject: Feature request for dark mode
tickets.description: It would be great if you could add a dark mode option to the settings page for better nighttime usage.

tickets.subject: Unexpected behavior in search
tickets.description: The search function returns unexpected results when using special characters. Steps to reproduce: type @# in search.

tickets.subject: Two-factor authentication not working
tickets.description: I enabled 2FA on my account but the verification codes are not being sent to my phone.

tickets.subject: Request refund for last payment
tickets.description: I would like to request a refund for my last payment as the service was down for three days.

tickets.subject: Server error 500 on dashboard
tickets.description: Getting a 500 server error every time I try to access the analytics dashboard page.

tickets.subject: Add export to PDF feature
tickets.description: Please add the ability to export reports to PDF format. This would be a nice enhancement.

tickets.subject: Regression in file upload
tickets.description: File upload was working last week but now consistently fails with large files. This is a regression.

tickets.subject: Account locked after password change
tickets.description: My account got locked immediately after I changed my password. Cannot access any features now.

tickets.subject: Invoice not showing correct amount
tickets.description: The invoice for February shows an incorrect amount that does not match my subscription plan.

tickets.subject: Page loads very slowly
tickets.description: The main dashboard page takes over 30 seconds to load. Everything is very slow and unresponsive.

tickets.subject: Suggestion for mobile notifications
tickets.description: I wish the app would support push notifications on mobile devices for important updates.

tickets.subject: Stack trace in payment module
tickets.description: Encountered a stack trace error in the payment processing module during checkout consistently.

tickets.subject: Cannot access shared documents
tickets.description: I cannot access the shared documents folder. I get an access denied error every time.

tickets.subject: Cancel subscription request
tickets.description: I need to cancel my subscription and get a prorated refund for the remaining billing period.

tickets.subject: Application freeze during save
tickets.description: The application freezes completely when trying to save large documents. Have to force quit every time.

tickets.subject: Could you add bulk import feature
tickets.description: Could you add the ability to bulk import data from spreadsheets? This would improve workflow significantly.

tickets.subject: Intermittent failure in notifications
tickets.description: The notification system has intermittent failures where alerts are not delivered to users reliably.
